entry.tran: (公司或机构的)董事会，理事会
entry.def: A directorate is a board of directors in a company or organization.

example.ex: The Bank would be managed by a directorate of professional bankers.
example.tran: 该银行将由一个职业银行家组成的董事会来管理。

entry.def: A directorate is a part of a government department which is responsible for one particular thing.

example.ex: ...the Health and Safety Directorate of the EU.
example.tran: 欧盟的健康安全理事会

means.word_mean: 1. a group of persons chosen to govern the affairs of a corporation or other large institution
